name: Castle Secrets: Between Day and Night
description: Revolutionary mix of Role-playing and Hidden Object games. Dark Castlevania style adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM Storage: 518 MB available space
